messages.message: Unexpected nullable string value in conditional. Please handle the nullish/empty cases explicitly.

suggestions.desc: Change condition to check for null/undefined (`value != null`)
Explicitly treat nullish value the same as an empty string (`value ?? ""`)
Explicitly convert value to a boolean (`Boolean(value)`)

messages.message: Unexpected console statement. Only these console methods are allowed: warn, error.

suggestions.desc: Remove the console.log().

messages.message: Unexpected string value in conditional. An explicit empty string check is required.

suggestions.desc: Change condition to check string's length (`value.length !== 0`)
Change condition to check for empty string (`value !== ""`)
Explicitly convert value to a boolean (`Boolean(value)`)
